body_html: @csjy309450 Are you trying to build pytorch on Windows? https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/pytorch/win-build.sh#L32-L105 would be the recommended steps for that and it will be using build_pytorch_libs.bat instead of build_pytorch_libs.sh.

body: @csjy309450 Are you trying to build pytorch on Windows? https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/pytorch/win-build.sh#L32-L105 would be the recommended steps for that and it will be using `build_pytorch_libs.bat` instead of `build_pytorch_libs.sh`.
